name: Angelfire
description:
Combat Unit Sagiri is flying to school with toast in her mouth when she is ambushed by some evil monsters that want to destroy her town.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys : Movement

Z/J : Shoot (variant A)

X/K : Shoot (variant B)

Collect Scrap by destroying enemies and picking up their remains.

As Scrap is collected, they will join together into a shield, which will protect you from damage! More Scrap means a larger shield!

Firing variant B requires a bit of scrap, but will shoot in a large radius to decimate enemies!

Balance the use of Scrap to maximize damage and survivability!
